Package org.water.bluetooth.application.utils

Class UUIDgenerator

java.lang.Object
org.water.bluetooth.application.utils.UUIDgenerator
public class UUIDgenerator extends Object
The UUIDgenerator class provides functionality for generating and accessing Universally Unique Identifiers (UUIDs). A UUID is a globally unique 128-bit (16-byte) number used to identify profiles, services, and data types in a Generic Attribute (GATT) profile.

This class contains methods to generate a UUID and retrieve the generated UUID. The UUID is created with a specific value and flags, and it is used in the context of the Bluetooth Server application.

The class is designed to be static, ensuring that the UUID generation and retrieval functionality is easily accessible without the need to instantiate an object.

Since:
2023-12-09
Version:
1.0
Author:
gubbriaco, agrandinetti, fnicoletti
